summary:
Journey 1 The trial of Heroes

 Part 2 To the rescue Our first goal was Pewter City. We traveled by train, in the middle of the...
caption:
Journey 1 The trial of Heroes
Part 2 To the rescue

Our first goal was Pewter City.
We traveled by train, in the middle of the way, we had to wait a half day. kacchan’s Pichu Denki, met a Rockruff. The battle was hard but the Rockruff himself decidet to stay with us. 

Together we contuine our jorney, in viridian forest we stayed for training when my Eevee ochako suddenly run away, screaming that we should follow we found a Ponyta. 
It seems that it feld into a rock crevice, it called for help. I catched it, it was pretty happy about it, even when kacchan don’t like the hasty nature of him. hehe~


-Midoriya

Part 1
https://asaka-sk.tumblr.com/post/183677080592/part-1-the-final-day-arrived-bakugou-and-i

random infos under the cut^^

Ochako is an eevee with dark colour and fallen ears 
Denki is a Pichu with a spark and a special tail
Ejirou is a Rockruff, I decidet to let the hair colour in the rockruff colour instead of coloring it dark :)
Iida is a Ponyta(love the fact that the name suits him so well Poniida, Ponya)

summary: Bakugo has nightmares after being kidnapped by the League of Villains. They're so bad that they can send him into a blind panic,...
body:
Bakugo has nightmares after being kidnapped by the League of Villains. They’re so bad that they can send him into a blind panic, attacking anything in sight. One night, he attacks Izuku. Not wanting to hurt Bakugo, Izuku resorts to other methods to get Bakugo to calm down.

Sitting on top of Bakugo, one hand pinning his wrists to the floor, the other gently but firmly fondling his cock through his jeans, Izuku kisses everywhere he can reach, leaving little trails of soft, warm kisses all over Bakugo’s flushed, heated skin, whispering sweetly to him, reassuring, comforting, loving until Bakugo’s breathing changes from hard, sharp, panicked, ragged gasps to hard, heavy pants, his chest heaving, hips grinding up against Izuku’s head, moaning loudly under his touch, tilting his head back to give Izuku better access.

When Bakugo gets to that point, Izuku slips down, kissing a line down Bakugo’s stomach and chest until he reaches the hem of his pants. Gently tugging them down, letting his dripping, rock hard cock bounce out. Taking the hard length between his lips, he slowly sinks all the way down until his nose his buried in thick, fragrant pubic hair. Bakugo’s back arches of the floor. 

Large, hot, sweaty hands land on his head; broad fingers weave through his hair, not pulling or tugging, just holding on as Izuku begins to bob up and down, stroking Bakugo’s cock with his mouth and tongue. Lewd, raspy, wanting moans pour out of Bakugo as his hips buck, driving his cock even deeper into Izuku’s mouth. Precum slides down his throat. Izuku swallows it all down greedily. He feels a little bad that he’s getting so turned on when he’s supposed to be comforting Bakugo but…he tastes so good! It feels so good to have Bakugo’s cock in his mouth. Bakugo’s making such lewd sounds, each one flaming the fire burning in the pit of his stomach. Pushing his own want away, Izuku focuses on Bakugo, wanting to make him feel good.

Bakugo cums with a strangled, choked cry, slamming his hips up, driving his cock deep into Izuku’s mouth. Moaning low in his throat, his own cock twitching hungrily inside his pants, Izuku swallows down every last drop. He doesn’t stop sucking until Bakugo’s cock starts to soften Slipping off of Bakugo’s cock, Izuku slid up, reaching down to cup Bakugo’s flushed, hot cheek. 

Leaning down, he pressed a gentle kiss to his sweaty forehead and asked, ‘Better?' 

Bakugo, still breathing heavily, his eyes closed, nods, his large hands sliding up Izuku’s back, tugging him down into a firm, hard embrace. Burying his face in Izuku’s hair, he breathes in deeply, Bakugo rasps, 'Give me a sec and I’ll return the favor’. 

Izuku’s cock twitches in anticipation and excitement but despite that, he’s not in any rush. Resting his weight on top of Bakugo, letting his eyes flutter closed, Izuku breathes, 'Just like this is fine. I don’t wanna move.' 

'I wanna touch you.’ Bakugo growls, though the obvious exhaustion in his voice is telling. 

Snorting, Izuku presses a kiss to his temple, 'There’ll be time for that later. For now, get some sleep.' 

Bakugo is silent for a few moments. Izuku starts to think that he might’ve already fallen asleep then he murmurs, his arm curling tighter around him, 'Stay.' 

'I’m not going anywhere.’ Izuku hesitates for a moment then places a soft kiss onto Bakugo’s lips, sighing in relief when Bakugo tiredly pushes up against him, returning the kiss with a sluggish one of his own. 

'Go to sleep. I’ll be right here when you wake up.’ Izuku whispers against Bakugo’s lips. Bakugo lets out a slow breath then he’s out like a light.

tags: Like this Theory Came to mind Just as i was waking up to have my morning smoke
Dabi Is A Todoroki Fight me
my feels have literally popped outta my chest like the face hugger
dude no wonder the doctor is a dabi Stan wtf
body:
HOLY SHIT GUYS

Everyone’s having theories about Ujiko Knowing dabi personally when he was his physician and knows exactly who Dabi is.

But A thought just came to mind after just waking up. What if Ujiko Not only was the doctor to the Todoroki Family. But also the one who modified Touya’s body when he went Dabi?

blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

summary: Everyone is quirkless and the only threat is schoolwork: the rp
title: Everyone is quirkless and the only threat is schoolwork: the rp
description:
by lovekami

insagram rp inboud woah

open for more details (:

Words: 127, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Other
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Hagakure Tooru, Ojiro Mashirao, Sero Hanta, Ashido Mina, Kaminari Denki, Shinsou Hitoshi, Yaoyorozu Momo, Jirou Kyouka, Asui Tsuyu, Tokoyami Fumikage, Shouji Mezou, Aoyama Yuuga, Iida Tenya
  • Relationships: Kaminari Denki/Shinsou Hitoshi, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Ashido Mina/Sero Hanta, Asui Tsuyu/Uraraka Ochako, Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo, Hagakure Tooru/Ojiro Mashirao, Shouji Mezou/Tokoyami Fumikage

summary:
Shigaraki: [To Twice]: GO F*** YOURSELF!
Twice: FOR YOUR INFORMATION, I COULD DO THAT IF I WANTED TO!
Shigaraki: Great News!...
body:
Shigaraki: [To Twice]: GO F*** YOURSELF!

Twice: FOR YOUR INFORMATION, I COULD DO THAT IF I WANTED TO!

Shigaraki: Great News! You’re not allowed to talk anymore.

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: Andy said:  Some girl is writing a really well done Mineta beatdown fic. After the first five chapters of plot, she marked it...
body:
Andy said:

Some girl is writing a really well done Mineta beatdown fic. After the first five chapters of plot, she marked it complete since it can be read as finished from there on out, and she adds a new Mineta death chapter every day. I hate Grape Juice. Love seeing him die. Figured she could use some publicity. See for yourself. xD

Grape Squishing

https://www.fanfiction.net/s/13113943/1/Grape-Squishing

If it’s not amazing, don’t share it. That simple.

i’ll share it! a follower or a passerby might be interested in it
